artist: Artist: Kaz , et al.; Publisher: Kaz , et al., New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, xerographic text and illustration of figure with fountain pen printed on yellow wove paper covers, with black ink pen drawings and inscriptions; 48 pp.
inscription: Front cover, black ink pen: TO: / FLY / (figral drawing) / -Kaz / HEY / FLY: / (figural drawing) / GARY
title: Who's Who
